meanings.definition: A person or thing that fuels.
meanings.sent1: The fuelers at the gas station work hard to keep the cars running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The factory relies on fuelers to power their machinery.
meanings.sent3: The little robot claimed to be a fueler, insisting it could power up any device.
meanings.sent4: Her positivity was the fueler that kept the team motivated during tough times.
meanings.sent5: In the world of imagination, fairies are often depicted as magical fuelers of nature.
